data.title: Russell Brand's Wife and Relationship History
data.meta_description: Who is Russell Brand dating? Many famous women have dated Russell Brand, and this list will give you more details about these lucky ladies. Including Russell ...
data.text:
Russell Brand and Laura Gallacher began their romantic journey in 2015, during which they fell deeply in love with one another. The couple tied the knot in August 2017 after experiencing a rollercoaster of emotions and memorable moments together, including the birth of their first daughter Mabel, who was born in November 2016. Their second daughter, Peggy, joined the family in July 2018, solidifying the love and commitment they share for each other.

Striking a balance between her own personal brand and being in a high-profile relationship, Laura Gallacher thrives as a lifestyle blogger and entrepreneur. Her unique sense of style and passion for interior design led her to create The Joy Journal, a platform dedicated to inspiring others to find joy in their everyday lives. Additionally, her marriage to Russell Brand has exposed her to the charming world of fame and its inevitable trials. Although Laura may not have been previously involved in any high-profile relationships, her marriage to Russell has only strengthened her public persona and allowed her to stand out in a sea of celebrities.

Between 2013 and 2014, Russell Brand and Jemima Khan were romantically linked after meeting at a London dinner party. Throughout their relationship, the couple was frequently spotted enjoying the city's social scene and making public appearances together. However, despite their seemingly strong connection, Russell and Jemima ultimately decided to part ways after about a year of dating.

Jemima Khan is best known for her work as a journalist and editor, making her mark on the British publishing scene with her sharp wit and insightful commentary. She has also been recognized for her philanthropic efforts, particularly for her work with UNICEF. Prior to her relationship with Russell Brand, Jemima was famously married to Pakistani cricketer turned politician Imran Khan. She has also been involved in high-profile relationships with Hugh Grant and Guy Ritchie, showcasing her ability to navigate the world of celebrity romance with grace and poise.

In 2013, a brief romance blossomed between Russell Brand and British model Zara Martin after they were introduced through mutual friends. During their short-lived relationship, the two frequently attended events together, including the iconic GQ Men of the Year Awards ceremony. Despite the potential for a deeper bond, their connection was relatively brief and ultimately ended in a mutual decision to separate.

Zara Martin is a successful model and DJ who has carved out a distinct niche within the fashion world, thanks to her unique aesthetic and creative talent. She has worked with numerous high-profile brands and photographers, earning her place among some of the industry's top talent. Zara's extensive resume and impressive social circle have allowed her to form strong connections within the entertainment industry, including a rumored relationship with actor and comedian Jack Whitehall.

In 2015, Russell Brand found himself in a brief fling with glamour model Sophie Coady after meeting at a London pub. The pair shared a passionate connection that led to a whirlwind romance with plenty of excitement and memorable moments. However, their relationship was short-lived, ending as quickly as it began.

Sophie Coady is a talented glamour model whose career has gained momentum through her breathtaking looks and natural charisma. Known for her work in magazines such as Loaded and Nuts, she has built a following of fans who admire her beauty and confidence. Despite not being directly involved in any other high-profile relationships, Sophie's connection with Russell Brand certainly put her on the map in the world of celebrity dating.

In 2012, sparks flew between Russell Brand and Geri Halliwell after they met at the Olympic closing ceremony in London. The duo was spotted on various dates, including an exciting visit to Hampton Court Palace with Geri's daughter Bluebell. Despite their seemingly promising connection, the relationship fizzled out after just a few weeks of dating.

Geri Halliwell, also known as Ginger Spice, rose to fame as a member of the groundbreaking girl group the Spice Girls. With her vivacious personality and undeniable talent, Geri became a household name and an icon of the '90s pop music scene. Although her love life has been filled with ups and downs, she has managed to maintain a strong public persona, marrying Formula One mogul Christian Horner in 2015.

Russell Brand and Isabella Brewster began their relationship in 2012 after meeting through mutual friends. The duo enjoyed a passionate romance for several months, with rumors even surfacing that the couple might be planning to tie the knot. However, their connection ultimately fizzled out, and the pair called it quits later that year.

Isabella Brewster is known for her work as a talent agent in Hollywood, helping to shape the careers of countless actors and actresses. She comes from a family of accomplished professionals, with her older sister Jordana Brewster being a successful actress herself. Isabella has also been linked to other high-profile relationships, such as dating actor Bradley Cooper before her romance with Russell Brand.
